1509800.name: MAK: Survival
1509800.description:
Mak Survival
Mak Survival is an open-world survival game where you play as a lone human survivor with a single mission:
Stay alive â€” and help evolve the world of Oratius, a land threatened by wild creatures and terrifying monsters.

As you explore Oratius, youâ€™ll witness the destruction these creatures have caused. Some regions remain beautiful and vibrant, while others have been left barren and lifeless.

ğŸª“ Survive, Build, and Choose Your Path

What kind of survivor will you be?

  • A builder creating a strong and secure base?

  • A hunter roaming deep forests for resources?

  • A helper supporting local villages and their people?

Gather resources across the world and use them for crafting, upgrading, and expanding your base.
Use specialized tools for mining, woodcutting, fishing, digging, and many other tasks needed for survival.

ğŸŒ Explore a Dynamic and Mysterious World

Discover unique locations filled with secrets and hidden dangers.
As your level increases, you unlock new abilities and equipment â€” including the ability to build your own glider for faster exploration. And with enough coins, you might even purchase a horse to travel the world more efficiently.

ğŸ¤ Singleplayer or Multiplayer â€” Your Choice

Mak Survival supports solo play, co-op, and dedicated servers.
Create your own worlds and explore them alone or with friends. Each world is unique, with its own history and mysteries waiting to be uncovered.

ğŸ§¬ Progress Through Ages

Develop your technology as you progress from the stone age to a modern era with metal bases, advanced crafting tools, and powerful weapons.

  • Level up to unlock new crafting options

  • Take on quests â€” some personal, some shareable with other players

  • Summon companions to help you fight and gather resources

  • Discover NPC villages where you can trade, buy, and sell items

Every world contains secrets that reveal themselves through exploration, quests, and progression.

ğŸ› ï¸ Customize Your Experience

Mak Survival includes a powerful Admin Panel for server owners and players who want full control. You can:

  • Configure your custom server settings

  • Manage allowlists

  • Spawn items and monsters

  • Heal players

  • And much more

Perfect for both small groups of friends and large multiplayer communities.

ğŸ® Key Features

  • Open-world survival gameplay

  • Base building and crafting

  • Resource gathering: mining, woodcutting, fishing, and more

  • Animals to hunt and mounts to ride

  • Buildable glider for exploration

  • Singleplayer, co-op, and dedicated server support

  • Age progression from primitive to modern

  • Companions and NPC trading villages

  • Extensive Admin Panel for server customization
